name: Hentai Angel: Smite the Nazis
description:
Hentai Angel: Smite the Nazis is a 3rd person adventure game, playing as a sexy and beautiful anime girl. You were sent to spy on Nazi equipment and you found an unusual Nazi lager that is swarming with Nazis, and in the camp itself the Nazis hung posters with various memes (Hmm, this is probably a disguise), the camp is full of surprises (or maybe not), so the Soldier, be careful, oh yes, Hitler in disguise with memes is also hiding. You need to kill BOSS HITLER! And also destroy Nazi technology. Forward!


    What awaits you in the game:
  • Enemies in the form of many evil Nazis
  • Beautiful anime girl with juicy breasts and powerful weapons
  • Posters with different memes
  • Funny boss Hitler in memes
  • Easy game to relax
  • Ability to blow up Nazi equipment
  • Relax and neigh to funny music
